EmailTemplate.subject: Volunteer on NCS!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Youth Board!
Sorry for any confusion, there was no meeting tonight, please accept our apologies for the technical error with eventbright.
We want to let you know about a fantastic opportunity open to you this summer to COME BACK AND VOLUNTEER ON NCS!
We are looking for inspiring members of the youth board to come and volunteer for the last week of the NCS programme. If you are interested please apply here:
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/response.jsp
What’s in it for you?
· Experience NCS from a different perspective: as part of the staff team! · Develop skills to enhance your record of achievement / CV / UCAS application · Attend specialist training on being a volunteer, youth work, and leadership · Receive 1:1 support from one of our NCS managers, who can also be a reference for any future applications you do once you have completed your placement
What are we looking for in an Associate Mentor?
· Reliability: Can you commit to at least four days in a row this summer? You can choose exactly when and where this would be! · Professionalism: Can you be a role model for current NCS particpants, and work as part of our staff team? · Positivity: Can you use your NCS experiences to motivate others?
· All applicants must attend Associate Mentor training on 31st May · If successful, your role will last for a minimum of four days during July or August 2016 (details will be confirmed once you have been to training)
If you are interested please apply!
Finally a quick reminder of the timeline of your event from Amy:
May- I will ensure older people are being invited to your event during this month as I know you are super busy! In the last meeting your youth board colleagues drew up a comprehensive list of people we need to invite.
June 22nd- Youth board will meet (times TBC) and focus on getting resources
July 3rd- Youth Board will visit local care homes and older people to invite them to the event personally
July 20th- Final Youth Board meeting before event (all need to attend!!)
July 23rd- Event from 1:30pm!
Email us at tcs.bucksandberks@the-challenge.org if you have any questions!
Best of luck with your revision and exams!
